answers.answer: Fresh blood/bright red blood is usually due to a hemorrhoid or some kind of little tear in the rectal area. Perhaps he needs a stool softener to ease things along. Not sure if the Plavix or baby aspirin is making him a bit more prone to bruising and bleeding.
